data.name: Cartel1t1
data.value: Dear Guardian,

data.name: Cartel1t10
data.value: INSTALL SILVERLIGHT

data.name: Cartel1t11
data.value: You are about to become Guardian!

data.name: Cartel1t12
data.value: I can not install it, but I want to participate

data.name: Cartel1t2
data.value: If you are using Chrome 45, Microsoft Edge or you are using Guardianes with a smartphone / tablet, please help us testing the preview of

data.name: Cartel1t3
data.value: , else follow the instructions to install Silverlight!

data.name: Cartel1t4
data.value: We are still developing this latest version, which replaces Silverlight with HTML5 web technology and will provide a superior user experience on all browsers, including mobile devices. After testing G3 please complete our

data.name: Cartel1t5
data.value: brief survey

data.name: Cartel1t6
data.value: (takes less than 10 minutes) or send us your comments via email to

data.name: Cartel1t7
data.value: -- your feedack is very important to us and helps us improve the platform. Thank you!

data.name: Cartel1t8
data.value: (Please note that the deforestation data generated during testing of Guardians 3 will be used internally only. Score obtained testing G3 is not applicable to the T-Shirt competition on Guardians 2. If you want to compete on Guardians 2, please that use that platform with a compatible browser. Thank you!)

data.name: Cartel1t9
data.value: Install the Microsoft Silverlight plugin, it takes a few seconds

data.name: Cartel2t2
data.value:
the browser you are currently using is not compatible with the technology that Guardians requires (Microsoft Silverlight is not available on Microsoft Edge, Google Chrome v45 and newer, as well as on mobile devices running iOS and Android).
To keep protecting our forests, please use

data.name: Cartel2t3
data.value: If you want to keep using your current browser, you can help us test

data.name: Cartel2t4
data.value: We are still developing this latest version, which replaces Silverlight with HTML5 web technology and will provide a superior user experience on all browsers, including mobile devices.

data.name: Cartel2t5
data.value: After testing G3 please complete our

data.name: Cartel2t6
data.value: your feedack is very important to us and helps us improve the platform. Thank you!

data.name: Cartel3t1
data.value: Instructions for using Guardians in Chrome versions 42/43/44

data.name: Cartel3t2
data.value: Type "chrome://flags/#enable-npapi" into the search bar (as if you were entering a website address)

data.name: Cartel3t3
data.value: On the upper left of the screen, a yellow option called "Enable NPAPI" will appear. Click on "Enable".

data.name: Cartel3t4
data.value: On the lower left of the screen, a button called "Relaunch now" will appear. Click on that button.

data.name: Cartel3t5
data.value: That's it. Your browser will restart, and you can continue protecting our forests!

data.name: LoginEmailHint
data.value: 电子邮件地址

data.name: LoginForgotPassword
data.value: 忘记密码了吗？

data.name: LoginForgotPasswordTitle
data.value: 新密码将发送至您的邮箱

data.name: LoginGuardiansImage
data.value: Images/guardianes.cn.png

data.name: LoginHeader
data.value:
请输入您的电子邮件地址
开始寻找林后！

data.name: LoginInvalidEmail
data.value: 您必须输入一个有效的电子邮件地址。

data.name: LoginInvalidUserOrPass
data.value: 用户名或密码不正确

data.name: LoginNextButton
data.value: 下一页>>

data.name: LoginPassword
data.value: 请以继续输入密码！

data.name: LoginPasswordHint
data.value: 密码

data.name: LoginPasswordRecoveryMessage
data.value:
我们向您发送电子邮件。         
        
        你应该在某一时刻接收到它。按照详细的重置密码的说明。         
        
        如果您没有收到邮件，请检查垃圾邮件文件夹，并确保您的过滤器允许greenpeace.org消息。         
        
        谢谢。

data.name: LoginPasswordRepeatHint
data.value: 重复密码

data.name: LoginPasswordValidationLength
data.value: 密码的长度必须至少为5

data.name: LoginPasswordValidationMatch
data.value: 给定的密码不匹配

data.name: LoginRegistrationFailed
data.value: 一个错误途中发生。我们无法完成注册。请与管理员联系。

data.value: 开始
